languages.text: {n}Нечестивый каркающий смех вновь заполняет ваш разум.{/n} "Потуги смертных так забавны. Брести впотьмах не зная открытых им путей и собственной участи — так жалко! Они не ровня тебе, знающ{mf|ему|ей} свой путь. Он стелется телами верующих в Истину — допустимая жертва ради твоего будущего величия".

{n}The unholy cackle fills your mind again.{/n} "The travails of mortals are so amusing. Wandering in the dark, ignorant of the paths open to them and of their own fate. How pathetic! They are not your equals, for you know your way. It is a path littered with the bodies of believers in the Truth: an acceptable sacrifice in the name of your future greatness."
languages.original_text: {n}Нечестивый каркающий смех вновь заполняет ваш разум.{/n} "Потуги смертных так забавны. Брести впотьмах не зная открытых им путей и собственной участи — так жалко! languages.text: {n}邪恶的笑声再次充斥你的脑海。{/n}“凡人的痛苦实在是太有趣了。他们在黑暗中徘徊，对前方的道路与自己的命运一无所知。多么可怜！他们根本不是你的同类，因为你能看到自己的道路。这条道路上到处都是信奉真理之人的尸体，但若是为了让你成就伟大，这样的牺牲是可以接受的。”
languages.original_text: {n}The unholy cackle fills your mind again.{/n} "The travails of mortals are so amusing. Wandering in the dark, ignorant of the paths open to them and of their own fate. How pathetic! They are not your equals, for you know your way. It is a path littered with the bodies of believers in the Truth: an acceptable sacrifice in the name of your future greatness."

traits.locale_text: {n}邪恶的笑声再次充斥你的脑海。{/n}“凡人的痛苦实在是太有趣了。他们在黑暗中徘徊，对前方的道路与自己的命运一无所知。多么可怜！他们根本不是你的同类，因为你能看到自己的道路。这条道路上到处都是信奉真理之人的尸体，但若是为了让你成就伟大，这样的牺牲是可以接受的。”

languages.text: {n}Das unheilige Gackern füllt wieder deinen Verstand.{/n} "Die Mühen der Sterblichen sind so amüsant. Sie wandeln im Dunkeln, ohne die Pfade zu kennen, die ihnen offenstehen, ohne ihr eigenes Schicksal zu kennen. Wie jämmerlich! Sie sind Euch nicht ebenbürtig, denn Ihr kennt Euren Weg. Es ist ein Pfad, der übersät ist mit den Leichen derer, die an die Wahrheit glauben: ein akzeptables Opfer im Namen Eurer zukünftigen Erhabenheit."
languages.original_text: {n}The unholy cackle fills your mind again.{/n} "The travails of mortals are so amusing. Wandering in the dark, ignorant of the paths open to them and of their own fate. How pathetic! They are not your equals, for you know your way. It is a path littered with the bodies of believers in the Truth: an acceptable sacrifice in the name of your future greatness."

Sie wandeln im Dunkeln, ohne die Pfade zu kennen, die ihnen offenstehen, ohne ihr eigenes Schicksal zu kennen. Wie jämmerlich! Sie sind Euch nicht ebenbürtig, denn Ihr kennt Euren Weg. Es ist ein Pfad, der übersät ist mit den Leichen derer, die an die Wahrheit glauben: ein akzeptables Opfer im Namen Eurer zukünftigen Erhabenheit."

languages.text: {n}Vuelve a resonar en tu mente esa impía carcajada.{/n} «Qué divertidas son las tribulaciones de los mortales. Vagan a oscuras, sin ver los caminos que se abren ante ellos, ignorando su propio destino. ¡Qué patético! No son tus iguales, pues tú conoces bien tu camino. Es un camino alfombrado con los cadáveres de los que creen en la Verdad: un sacrificio aceptable en nombre de tu futura grandeza».
languages.original_text: {n}The unholy cackle fills your mind again.{/n} "The travails of mortals are so amusing. Wandering in the dark, ignorant of the paths open to them and of their own fate. How pathetic! They are not your equals, for you know your way. It is a path littered with the bodies of believers in the Truth: an acceptable sacrifice in the name of your future greatness."

Es un camino alfombrado con los cadáveres de los que creen en la Verdad: un sacrificio aceptable en nombre de tu futura grandeza».

languages.text: {n}Le rire impie résonne de nouveau dans votre esprit.{/n} « Les épreuves que doivent surmonter les mortels sont si amusantes. Ils errent dans les ténèbres, sans même remarquer les voies qui s'ouvrent à eux ni prendre conscience de leur destin. Comme c'est pathétique ! Vous valez bien mieux qu'eux, car vous savez où vous allez. Vous suivez un chemin couvert des cadavres des fidèles de la vérité, un sacrifice acceptable au nom de votre future grandeur. »
languages.original_text: {n}The unholy cackle fills your mind again.{/n} "The travails of mortals are so amusing. Wandering in the dark, ignorant of the paths open to them and of their own fate. How pathetic! They are not your equals, for you know your way. It is a path littered with the bodies of believers in the Truth: an acceptable sacrifice in the name of your future greatness."

languages.text: {n}不浄で甲高い笑い声が再び頭の中に響く。{/n}「人間の苦難は実に愉快ね。暗闇の中をさまよい、道が開かれていることも、自らの運命も知らないで。哀れなこと！あなたは彼らと違って、自分の道を知っている。その道は真理を信じる者たちの死体が散乱している。あなたの未来の偉大さの名の下に、積み上げられた犠牲よ」
languages.original_text: {n}The unholy cackle fills your mind again.{/n} "The travails of mortals are so amusing. Wandering in the dark, ignorant of the paths open to them and of their own fate. How pathetic! They are not your equals, for you know your way. It is a path littered with the bodies of believers in the Truth: an acceptable sacrifice in the name of your future greatness."

languages.text: {n}Günahkâr bir kıkırtı, yeniden zihninde yankılanıyor.{/n} "Ölümlülerin sancılarına tanık olmak çok eğlenceli. Karanlıkta, bizzat kendi önlerinde ve kaderlerinde açılan yolların farkında olmaksızın geziniyorlar. Ne kadar da acınası! Dengin değiller, zira sen yolunu biliyorsun. Ati azametine ulaşman için feda edilmesi gereken, Hakikat'e inananların cesetleriyle kaplı bir yol..."
languages.original_text: {n}The unholy cackle fills your mind again.{/n} "The travails of mortals are so amusing. Wandering in the dark, ignorant of the paths open to them and of their own fate. How pathetic! They are not your equals, for you know your way. It is a path littered with the bodies of believers in the Truth: an acceptable sacrifice in the name of your future greatness."
